text.en: Amidst the waves of the Lord of the World’s compassion1
text.en-trans: jikten wangchuk tukjé lab treng ü

text.en: Blossoms a thousand-petalled lotus of all the buddhas’ wisdom and love,
text.en-trans: gyal künkhyen tsé dab tong gyepa la

text.en: Radiating the sweet fragrance of benefit and happiness—
Ngawang Namgyal, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: ngawang namgyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In your wisdom, you conquer the darkness of ignorance;
text.en-trans: khyenpé marik münpé tsok jom shing

text.en: In your love, you never forsake the welfare of others;
In your power, you overcome the forces of Māra—
text.en-trans: nüpé düpung jom jé lha yi lha

text.en: Supremely divine Ngawang Namgyal, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: ngawang namgyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: To liberate sentient beings from the three realms of saṃsāra,
text.en-trans: kham sum semchen khorwa lé drol chir

text.en: Having perfectly attained the supreme, immortal vajra-kāya,
text.en-trans: chimé dorjé ku chok rab nyé né

text.en: May you bring benefit through the four kinds of activity
text.en-trans: trinlé nam zhi drowé dön dzepé

text.en: And remain forever, as long as existence itself endures.
text.en-trans: jisi tso zhing zhepar gyur chik gu
